turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Dear assistant, please order me a coffee for pick up from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location of Starbucks would you like? There are two near your city.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are the two.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is one on Glenn Avenue and one on the university campus.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Which is busier at this time of day usually?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I just looked it up. Usually the one on the university campus is busier.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, I want the one on Glenn.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it, what drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tall iced pumpkin spice chai latte with whole milk no whipped cream and light ice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that will be it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to pick it up now or schedule it for later?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it to be made fresh, but I will be there in about 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will schedule it for pickup in 15 minutes at the Starbucks on Glenn under your name.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total cost is $5.16

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It was charged successfully to your account

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink will be ready for pickup shortly and your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks
